src:
Capek Lihat Emery, Arsenal Diminta Pecahkan Celengan Demi Gaet Brendan Rodgers
05 Nov 2019, 23:28 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Eks gelandang Arsenal Paul Merson menyindir kinerja buruk Unai Emery dan menyarankan pada The Gunners agar menggantinya dengan manajer Leicester City, Brendan Rodgers.
Emery musim ini diprediksi akan membuat Arsenal tampil lebih baik. Apalagi ia mendapat tambahan beberapa amunisi yang berkualitas.
Akan tetapi, ternyata manajer asal Spanyol itu tak bisa memenuhi ekspektasi fans Arsenal. Ia pun disebut hanya membuat The Gunners jalan di tempat.
Emery pun belakangan ini disebut berada di ambang pemecatan. Beberapa nama seperti Jose Mourinho dan Patrick Vieira pun dikaitkan dengan Arsenal.
text:
Tired of looking at Emery, Arsenal are asked to break the piggy bank for the sake of Gaet Brendan Rodgers
05 Nov 2019, 23:28 by Bola.net
Former Arsenal midfielder Paul Merson quipped Unai Emery's poor performance and suggested to the Gunners to replace him with Leicester City manager Brendan Rodgers.
This season's Emery is predicted to make Arsenal perform better. Moreover, he received additional quality ammunition.
However, it turns out that the Spanish manager could not meet the expectations of Arsenal fans. He also called only make the Gunners way in place.
Emery was later said to be on the verge of being fired. Some names like Jose Mourinho and Patrick Vieira were also associated with Arsenal.
